articles.title: New blood test for coeliac disease can diagnose autoimmune condition without need to eat gluten
articles.description: Australian researchers hope test is a ‘game-changer’ for accuratelydiagnosing those following a strict gluten-free diet
articles.content:

articles.title: Judy's last meal: Perth researchers uncover 95-million-year-old stomach contents of dinosaur
articles.description: The world’s first reported stomach contents of a sauropod dinosaur have just come out of Curtin University, right here in Perth.
articles.content:
The world’s first reported stomach contents of a sauropod dinosaur have just come out of Curtin University, right here in Perth.
